content: this legal text explains the progress of a divorce case between mr and mrs the parties have made various declarations and agreements regarding their divorce including acknowledging their belgian nationality and marriage in 2017 acknowledging the existence of a child born during their marriage and making an inventory of their community property and detailed statements of their assets and debts they have also agreed on the division of their property and debts as well as arrangements for parental authority residence for their child and the contribution to the childs cost of living the document also includes declarations regarding the registration of the divorce the costs and fees of the proceedings and the jurisdiction of the family court the parties have confirmed their identity and the notary has certified their identities the notary has explained their obligations and provided impartial advice the parties confirm their understanding and acceptance of any conflicting clauses in the agreement they also declare their legal capacity and absence of bankruptcy or judicial reorganization on a specific date the parties signed the necessary documents in the presence of a notary
